name: SUPER TURBO X-TREME SPACE!!!!!!!!! FOREVER!!!!!!!!!!
description:
Concept:

This game is a retro styled shoot em up, where aliens have taken over and your main objective is to survive

Additional Notes:

This is my first 3D project, everything that could've gone wrong in development did but I am happy with how it turned out. I hope you enjoy :) Also check out my 2D game it's a lot better.

Follow Me :)
